name: Marlene Betwixt (itch)
description:
Marlene is a tense and immersive psychological horror story in which you star as the protagonist Ewan Brody. Ewan is on his way to visit his estranged sister at her remote cottage after hearing the news that his Niece Marlene has disappeared or possibly something worse!

As you uncover the mystery by completing environmental tasks and puzzle solving you will be relentlessly pursued by a mysterious figure who's motives are unclear.

Enter an interactive horror story that immerses the player in it's supernatural setting and piece together what has been happening around the estranged family.

Playable as a standard PC game - joypad & mouse/keyboard supported.
Playable in VR as a room scale experience for the HTC Vive & Oculus Touch
Environmental tasks, puzzle solving and object manipulation
Psychological horror visual and audio elements *Headphones are advised for the best audio experience*

Marlene is the first indie game release from UziGames and was produced & developed solely by one individual.
